text: Alexander Lamalfa Diaz (1947 - 18 August 2021) was a Spanish physician and politician. He was born in Santoña, Spain. He was the Mayor of Barruelo de Santullán from 1990 until 2007 and again from 2011 until 2016. He was also a Senator from 1996 until 2000. Lamalfa was a member of the People's Party. Lamalfa died on 18 August 2021 in Camargo, Spain at the age of 74.Fallece el exalcalde de Barruelo Alejandro Lamalfa ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish physicians
title: Alejandro Lamalfa
